full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN CHEN PO SKYES MCHOG PO TO PA'I GNAM THIG SPRINGS YIG BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @010A *, ,(` PAn CHEN SH'AKYA SHR'I'I RNAM THAR BZHI NI, NYIN GCIG GI 'TSO BA LAS LHAG PA BRE GANG YANG RANG DON DU MI 'DZIN PA DANG, NYIN ZHAG PHRUGS RE LA CHOS SPYOD BCU KHA TSANG RE MDZAD PA DANG, RKYEN CI BYUNG YANG STONG PA NYID BSGOM PA MA GTOGS BSRUNG BA GZHAN MI BYED PA DANG, ,GNOD PA BYED PA'I LAN DU PHAN 'DOGS PA DANG BZHI YIN ZHES BLO SBYONG SNYAN BRGYUD CHEN MO LAS GSUNGS SO,, ,,PAR 'DI KHAL KHA GA-YAS RU'I SA CHAR HU CAR THU'I KHU RAL DU PA NYDZA RAKshA BYA BA'I GRVA BAS BSGRUGS SO, ,)
